attributes.action: Increase Mr Speaker's powers to intervene at PMQs
attributes.additional_details: Parliamentary procedure to change to empower Mr Speaker to be able to insist that the Prime Minister answers the question put to him at PMQs - to avoid questionsfrom Honourable and Rt Honourable Members being side-stepped or avoided by the Prime Minisster.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the House not for Government
